name: Sonic AI
description: Sonic AI is a cutting-edge AI-driven platform built on Solana, empowering users with fully autonomous, self-learning AI agents that optimize trading, execute DeFi strategies Fully integrated with Solana Built for Solana with effortless integration into top AI models. Smooth Transactions Enjoy ultra-efficient, instant, and frictionless transactions. Fully integrated with Solana for seamless trading, token swaps (especially memecoin), NFT transactions, and blockchain tracking. Cutting-edge AI agents Built for Solana, leveraging on-chain tools, data, and top AI models like OpenAI, Claude, and Gemini for seamless automation and smart decision-making.
